TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlySpan`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class ReadOnlySpan

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: 提供任意内存的连续区域的类型安全和内存安全只读表示。

span.span: Provides a type-safe and memory-safe read-only representation of a contiguous region of arbitrary memory.

remarks.format: `ReadOnlySpan` 是在堆栈上分配的[ref 结构](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types)，不能转义给托管堆。`ReadOnlySpan` is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types) that is allocated on the stack and can never escape to the managed heap. Ref 结构类型具有多个限制，以确保无法将它们提升为托管堆，包括不能将它们装箱、捕获到 lambda 表达式中、赋给类型 的变量、赋给 `dynamic` 变量，并且它们不能实现任何接口类型。Ref struct types have a number of restrictions to ensure that they cannot be promoted to the managed heap, including that they can't be boxed, captured in lambda expressions, assigned to variables of type , assigned to `dynamic` variables, and they cannot implement any interface type. `ReadOnlySpan` 实例通常用于引用数组或某个数组的一部分的元素。A `ReadOnlySpan` instance is often used to reference the elements of an array or a portion of an array. 但与数组不同，`ReadOnlySpan` 实例可以指向托管内存、本机内存或在堆栈上管理的内存。Unlike an array, however, a `ReadOnlySpan` instance can point to managed memory, native memory, or memory managed on the stack.

remarks.format: 此构造函数应谨慎使用，因为它在内存块中创建任意类型的 `T`。This constructor should be used with care, since it creates arbitrarily typed `T`s from a block of memory.

remarks.format: 如果 `source` 和 `destination` 重叠，则在将 `source` 复制到 `destination`之前，将对整个进行处理，就像它已复制到临时位置。If the `source` and `destination` overlap, the entirety of `source` is handled as if it was copied to a temporary location before it is copied to `destination`.

remarks.format: 这会测试两个 实例是否指向相同的起始内存位置，并且具有相同的 值。This tests if two instances point to the same starting memory location, and have the same values. 这不会比较两个 实例的内容。This does not compare the contents of two instances.

remarks.format: 如果两个 实例的长度不同，或者如果 `left` 和 `right` 的相应元素指向不同的内存位置，则这两个实例不相等。Two instances are not equal if they have different lengths or if the corresponding elements of `left` and `right` point to different memory locations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

span.span: Copies the contents of this read-only span into a new array.

remarks.format: 此方法执行堆分配和数据复制，因此，应尽可能避免使用。This method performs a heap allocation and data copy, and therefore, should be avoided if possible. 当支持 的 Api 不可用时，有时需要使用它，但使用数组的 Api 是。It it sometimes necessary when APIs that support are not available, but APIs that work with arrays are.

remarks.format: 对于 `ReadOnlySpan`，`ToString` 方法返回一个 ，其中包含跨距指向的字符。For a `ReadOnlySpan`, the `ToString` method returns a that contains the characters pointed to by the span. 否则，它将返回一个 ，其中包含类型的名称和范围包含的元素数。Otherwise, it returns a with the name of the type and the number of elements that the span contains.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryCopyTo(valuetype System.Span`1<!T> destination) cil managed
Public Function TryCopyTo (destination As Span(Of T)) As Boolean

span.span: The target of the copy operation.

summary.span: 尝试将此 的内容复制到 中，并返回一个值以指示操作是否成功。

span.span: Attempts to copy the contents of this into a and returns a value to indicate whether or not the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果复制操作已成功，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the copy operation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: 如果 `source` 和 `destination` 重叠，则在将 `source` 复制到 `destination`之前，将对整个进行处理，就像它已复制到临时位置。If the `source` and `destination` overlap, the entirety of `source` is handled as if it was copied to a temporary location before it is copied to `destination`. 如果 `destination` 长度小于 `source`，则不会复制任何项，并且方法将返回 `false`。If the `destination` length is shorter than `source`, no items are copied and the method returns `false`.
